output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: Not present, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. References to Candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" as a presidential candidate.
3. Addresses Wide Population: - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Reaches between 10,000-14,999 impressions - Uses general, broad messaging addressing all voters - Posted by an official AUR party page
4. Electoral Objective: - Clearly promotes George Simion for president - Directly encourages voting for him ("îl voi vota pe George Simion - preşedinte") - Makes political arguments to influence voting decisions - Contrasts with other candidates through "răul cel mai mic" narrative
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is not journalistic content - Contains emotional appeals rather than factual reporting - Clearly advocacy rather than information
6. Personal Opinion: - While framed as a personal view ("îl voi vota"), it's a paid political message from an official party page - The reach and paid nature transform this from personal opinion to organized propaganda

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Paid advertisement with significant reach - Posted by official party channel - Clear electoral objective - Makes campaign arguments - Directly calls for votes
conclusion.message-for-police: AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei de campanie, constând într-o postare sponsorizată pe Facebook (ID: 979381740667749) care îndeamnă în mod explicit la votarea candidatului George Simion la funcția de președinte. Postarea, difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, conține mesaje de susținere directă și îndemn la vot ("îl voi vota pe George Simion - preşedinte"), având un impact semnificativ prin atingerea a 10,000-14,999 de persoane prin intermediul unei cheltuieli publicitare de aproximativ 150 RON.
